content: now you ll continue working in the round again with rs of n3 facing you pick up and knit 14 16 stitches from along the side of the heel flap onto n3 pick up 1 extra stitch at the corner of the instep to eliminate having a small gap in the corner you should now have a total of 31 37 stitches on n3 continue knitting the pattern from the instructions on page 3 on n1 and n2 picking up where you left off which should be round 2 remember this is the front of the sock or the instep now you will need the extra needle that you put aside using this needle pick up 1 stitch in the corner of the instep and then pick up 14 16 stitches along the other edge of the heel flap continue knitting 8 10 stitches to the marker from old n3 now n4 remove marker using a separate needle knit across n4 you should now have the following number of stitches on each needle n1 14 16 n2 14 16 n3 23 27 n4 23 27 4 © the kitchen sink shop heel decrease round 1 continue knitting as per written instructions on n1 and n2 instep needles for n3 k1 ssk k to end for n4 k to 3 stitches from the end k2tog k1 round 2 continue knitting as per written instructions on page 3 on n1 and n2 instep needles knit all stitches on n3 and n4 round 3 continue knitting as per written instructions on page 3 on n1 and n2 instep needles for n3 k1 ssk k to end for n4 k to 3 stitches from the end k2tog k1 round 4 continue knitting as per written instructions on page 3 on n1 and n2 instep needles knit all stitches on n3 and n4 repeat rounds 1 to 4 to decrease the gusset until you have a total of 56 64 stitches or 14 16 stitches on each of your 4 needles then continue knitting as per the written instructions on page 3 until the foot of the sock measures approx 1 5 inches 3 5 cm shorter than your desired foot length from back of your heel to end of your big toe toe decrease round 1 n1 k1 ssk k to end n2 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 n3 k1 ssk k to end n4 k to 3 stitches before end k2tog k1 round 2 k across all stitches n1-n4 repeats rounds 1 and 2 above until only 7 8 stitches remain on each needle total 28 32 stitches distribute evenly on 2 needles use tapestry needle to kitchener the stitches together and close the toe weave in ends soak and block if desired congratulations you re done now you re ready to go ahead with sock two 5 © the kitchen sink shop abbreviations k knit p purl n - needle yo yarnover ssk slip 1 stitch knit wise onto
